structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.text: Any fund created hereunder may be terminated upon written application made to the secretary by the university and a finding by the secretary that other satisfactory and adequate arrangements have been made by the university to assure that both existing and future health care malpractice claims or judgments against it will be paid and satisfied. Upon the termination of any fund pursuant to this section, the full amount remaining in said fund upon termination less any outstanding indebtedness shall promptly be repaid to the university.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 4.
